item.title: These banks are still paying 4% yields on CDs. How to figure out whether you should lock in
item.description: The Federal Reserve has stood pat on interest rates this year — and some banks, too, are holding yields steady for certificates of deposit.

item.title: Josh Brown talks two big bank stocks after earnings reports
item.description: The investor broke down the case for Citigroup and JPMorgan shares after the banks released their latest quarterly financials.

item.title: The charts are showing app stock Life360 has more room to run
item.description: Chart analyst Todd Gordon breaks down the technical outlook in Life360.

item.title: Beware owning these stocks during earnings season, says Goldman Sachs
item.description: Goldman Sachs warned investors against owning stocks such as Hershey and eBay this earnings season.

item.title: GAMCO Investors CEO Mario Gabelli shares two pro stock picks he’s ‘nibbling at’ daily
item.description: GAMCO Investors CEO Mario Gabelli is bullish on Textron and National Fuel Gas.
